#summary Introduction to perlwikipedia


= Example code =

{{{
use Perlwikipedia; #Note that the 'p' is capitalized, due to Perl style

#Create a Perlwikipedia object
my $editor=Perlwikipedia->new(); 

#Log in. If the language is not set (see below) it defaults to 'en' (English)
$editor->login('perlwikipediabot','supersecretpassword'); 

#Set the wiki language to 'de' (German)
# Wikipedias in all languages use 'w' as the path                                           
# (de.wikipedia.org/w/index.php)
$editor->set_wiki('de.wikipedia.org','w'); 

#Pull the wikitext of the Main Page
my $text=$editor->get_text('Main Page'); 
}}}
